acf.title: Global Head of Credit and Mortgage Risk
acf.bio_copy:
Jeff Verschleiser is the Global Head of Credit and Mortgage Risk and a member of the Office of the CIO. He is responsible for managing all risks within our Credit and Mortgage businesses.

Prior to joining Millennium, Jeffrey was a Partner and Chief Investment Officer of the Credit platform at Reverence Capital Partners. Before that he was a Partner and Head of Global Credit, Municipal and Mortgage Trading at Goldman Sachs, where he was a member of the Firm-wide Risk Committee and the Firm-wide Capital Committee. He began his career at Bear Stearns, where he was the Co-Head of Mortgage Trading.

Jeff earned a bachelor’s degree in Business Administration from the University of Vermont.
acf.subtitle: Office of the CIO
